title: Moz News - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Sarah Bird November 1, 2021 Sarah's Goodbye Moz News After 14 years with Moz, Sarah says goodbye. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis September 23, 2021 A Statement of Land Acknowledgement, Published Today With Gratitude Moz News We are deeply grateful to the many members of the Tribes, Nations, and Bands on whose homelands our teams live and work, and who generously gave their time over the past year to consult with us on our new Statement of Land Acknowledgement. Read this post By: Sarah Bird July 6, 2021 A Statement in Support of Indigenous Peoples in This Time of Grief Moz News We express solidarity with the Indigenous communities of this continent grieving their precious lost children. Read this post By: Hayley Bowyer June 30, 2021 MozCon Virtual 2021 Interview Series: Dana DiTomaso SEO Events | Advanced SEO | Moz News We're thrilled to welcome Dana DiTomaso back to this year’s MozCon Virtual where she’ll discuss modern web development that puts SEO first. Check out what she has to share ahead of the show! Read this post By: Sarah Bird June 28, 2021 Remembering Our Friend, Russ Jones Moz News Russ was brilliant, funny, courageous, and empathetic. His impact on the SEO industry was incredible. He will be missed beyond words. Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard June 7, 2021 100% Free Technical SEO Site Audit Checklist (& Beyond) Technical SEO | Moz News Learn the tools and tactics you'll need to pinpoint technical issues on your site and turn them into wins for your users and your rankings with this free technical SEO checklist from Moz. Read this post By: Sarah Bird June 4, 2021 Moz Acquired by iContact Marketing Corp Moz News | Marketing Industry We're thrilled to announce our acquisition by iContact Marketing Corp! Check out Sarah and Michael's chat discussing the details, and please celebrate with us as we chart the future of Moz together. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper May 26, 2021 The MozCon 2021 Final Agenda SEO Events | Moz News MozCon 2021 is right around the corner! Read on to see what this year has in store, and don't forget to purchase your ticket! Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard March 30, 2021 New & Improved: Announcing The Beginner's Guide To Link Building Link Building | Moz News Moz first published the Beginner's Guide to Link Building in 2014. While much has changed in link building since then, a lot has stayed the same. If you're new to link building, or simply want to improve your success rate and/or processes, we encourage you to give this new and updated guide a read. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper March 24, 2021 Announcing: The MozCon Virtual 2021 Initial Agenda Moz News | SEO Events Join Ringmaster Roger and marketing experts from around the world for three days packed with presentations on SEO, search marketing, mobile, conversion optimization, local search, and more — all from the comfort of home. Read this post By: Sarah Bird March 19, 2021 Stop Asian Hate Moz News We condemn the horrific acts of hate and violence targeting the Asian American and Pacific Islander (AAPI) community, which culminated in the tragic mass shooting in Georgia on March 17th. We mourn the loss of life and grieve with the families that have been broken by this latest racist, misogynistic hate crime. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis February 17, 2021 Presenting: The Essential Local SEO Strategy Guide Local SEO | SEO Tools | Moz News Moz is proud to present you with this free local search guide, jam-packed with actionable local search marketing strategies for your agency or local business. Read this post By: Kavi Kardos February 2, 2021 Announcing the New Technical SEO Certification Series: What It Is & How to Get Certified Technical SEO | Moz News The Moz Learning Team has put in many, many hours of work to develop a technically focused, in-depth training series that hones in on the nuts and bolts of technical SEO. We’re thrilled to announce the launch of the Technical SEO Certification Series through Moz Academy. Read this post By: Cassandra Schwartz January 26, 2021 Study Confirms Moz Has the Largest Link Data Set Moz News | SEO Tools | Link Building In measuring the success of your backlink efforts and informing your future SEO priorities, the data matters. Depending on the tool you use, your results can vary greatly and — in this case — the more data the better. With this in mind, we’re excited to share that Moz has the largest link data set, according to a study done by Perficient. Read this post
